text: The New York Times Building is a skyscraper in New York City, United States. It is tall and has 52 floors. It was built in 2007 and is one of the tallest buildings in the world. The architect of the building is Renzo Piano. == Related pages == * List of tallest buildings in the world * List of tallest buildings in New York City == Other websites == * Official Website * Emporis.com – New York Times Building * SkycraperPage.com – New York Times Building Category:Skyscrapers in New York City Category:2007 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in New York (state) Category:Buildings and structures in Manhattan
title: The New York Times Building
